price: Ìwọ Ànábì, gbógun ti àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ àti àwọn ṣọ̀bẹ-ṣèlu mùsùlùmí. Kí o sì le mọ́ wọn. Ibùgbé wọn sì ni iná Jahanamọ. Ìkángun náà sì burú.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu jāhidi al-kufāra wal-munāfiqīna wa-ugh'luẓ ʿalayhim wamawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
